functions.name: abs
functions.description: Computes the absolute value of a number.

functions.name: acos
functions.description: Computes the arc cosine of a number.

functions.name: asin
functions.description: Computes the arc sine of a number.

functions.name: atan
functions.description: Computes the arc tangent of a number.

functions.name: atan2
functions.description: Computes the arc tangent of y/x in the range [-pi, pi].

functions.name: ceil
functions.description: Rounds a number up to the nearest integer greater than or equal to it.

functions.name: cos
functions.description: Computes the cosine of a number.

functions.name: cosh
functions.description: Computes the hyperbolic cosine of a number.

functions.name: exp
functions.description: Computes the base-e exponential function of a number.

functions.name: fabs
functions.description: Computes the absolute value of a number.

functions.name: floor
functions.description: Rounds a number down to the nearest integer less than or equal to it.

functions.name: fmod
functions.description: Computes the floating-point remainder of x/y.

functions.name: frexp
functions.description: Breaks a floating-point number into its normalized fraction and exponent.

functions.name: hypot
functions.description: Computes the square root of the sum of the squares of x and y.

functions.name: ldexp
functions.description: Multiplies a floating-point number by 2 raised to the given exponent.

functions.name: log
functions.description: Computes the natural logarithm of a number.

functions.name: log10
functions.description: Computes the common (base-10) logarithm of a number.

functions.name: modf
functions.description: Breaks a floating-point number into its integral and fractional parts.

functions.name: pow
functions.description: Computes base raised to the power of exponent.

functions.name: round
functions.description: Rounds a number to the nearest integer.

functions.name: sin
functions.description: Computes the sine of a number.

functions.name: sinh
functions.description: Computes the hyperbolic sine of a number.

functions.name: sqrt
functions.description: Computes the square root of a number.

functions.name: tan
functions.description: Computes the tangent of a number.

functions.name: tanh
functions.description: Computes the hyperbolic tangent of a number.

functions.name: trunc
functions.description: Truncates a number to its integral part.
